issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
It appears it's just broken. Feel free to assign it to me.


If you ever try, the log file will be filled with this message.

Wed Mar 18 20:02:48 2015 ERROR [ListenerRegistry:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#2673] com.eucalyptus.event.EventFailedException: Failed to fire event: listener=com.eucalyptus.vm.CreateImageTask.CreateImageTasksManager event=java.util.NoSuchElementException: example: [VmInstance networkConfig=null vmId=null bootRecord=null usageStats=null launchRecord=null runtimeState=null transientVolumeState=null placement=null expiration=null privateNetwork=null networkGroups=[] networkGroupIds=[] networkIndex=null tags=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=i-f8d9a2c7 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null] because of: example: [VmInstance networkConfig=null vmId=null bootRecord=null usageStats=null launchRecord=null runtimeState=null transientVolumeState=null placement=null expiration=null privateNetwork=null networkGroups=[] networkGroupIds=[] networkIndex=null tags=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=i-f8d9a2c7 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]

comments.body:
This does not always manifest. The condition that triggers is 
-- A CreateImage task is stuck for some reason (in this case snapshot not being created)
-- The instance is terminated and this causes the entity lookup failure
-- Now all CreateImage tasks fail due to the unhandled exception

[~spark], so far I was not able to re-create the same error. In my case if snapshot creation is failed there is outstanding CreateImage task and next attempt to run create-image for this instance fails. This is probably a bug that also needs to be fixed. I have not see instance termination so far. Do you have any ideas how to trigger this error reliably?

The cause of the problem is that the instance terminates when there is a failed task. The monitoring loop continue to look up the instance that is already removed from the db and the DB look up throws ElementNotFoundException. See getVmInstance().
[~spark], where do you see that system terminates instances if its create image task is failed?
[~vasya] It is not the system terminating instances. It's the case that users terminate the instances for any reason.
Provided a new fix in the 7bf40d1d8c9dc65dec1a82af1017290aacb627c7

Hi [~vasya] [~spark], 
I have a cloud which is still failing to create-image. This cloud has been upgraded to 4.1.1. 
It's not obvious to me why this is failing? The system info below if you'd like to have a look please do, thanks!
Hopefully my goof, but  I'm going to revert this for tracking purposes. 
-Matt


{code}

[~vasya] is out this week, would you mind taking a look, [~spark]?
[~dmitrii], [~spark] is also out this week. I think we agreed that this bug can wait. Assigning it back to myself.
[~mclark], did you de-register image before calling CreateImage?

Hi [~vasya], 
Yes, sorry was probably due to another test I was running. This seems like a valid use case, but a separate issue.  I opened EUCA-10748 to track. 
Closing this as fixed. 
Thanks!
-M
Was this really fixed in 4.1.2? I think the version should change to 4.1.1, no?
[~dmitrii], Yes, the commits went into maint-4.1 in March 31 and 30.
